description: Strengthening National &  Local Capacities fo Disaster Response & Risk Reduction

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: Volunteers are a critical component of disaster response and preparedness. The project will leverage and develop volunteer capacities, as well as promote volunteerism to engage and mobilise community members in grassroots disaster risk management efforts. Risk and vulnerability assessments and community-based disaster management planning will effectively rely on the participation of volunteers in these processes and the sustainability of a disaster management system at local level.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Disaster Risk Reduction
